description: Vascular access  information from abstractions with clinical hemodialysis or other dialysis information reported to the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: VA_SESS_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's vascular access session date.

columns.name: VA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dialysis patient's current vascular access type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


AVFonly


AVFwAVG


AVFwCatheter


AVFsingle


AVGonly


AVGwCatheter


AVGsingle


CatheterOnly


PortOnly


Other

columns.name: VA_CHANGE_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's vascular access change date.

columns.name: AVF_USABLE_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's vascular access arteriovenous fistula change date.

columns.name: AVF_IS_MATURING_YN
columns.description:
Shows whether the dialysis patient's vascular access arteriovenous fistula is maturing or not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: AVF_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dialysis patient's vascular access arteriovenous fistula current state.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


NotPresent


Created


Active


Inactive


Removed

columns.name: AVF_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's vascular access arteriovenous fistula creation date.

columns.name: AVG_IS_MATURING_YN
columns.description:
Shows whether the dialysis patient's vascular access arteriovenous fistula graft is maturing or not.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AVF_IS_MATURING_YN

columns.name: AVG_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dialysis patient's vascular access arteriovenous fistula graft current state.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AVF_STATE_C_NAME
